displayName.japanese: アンダースカルの力によって

description.brazilian: Derrote a Chefe da gangue Clã Caveira, Marga Subestunto!
description.english: Defeat the Skull Clan Gang Boss, Marga Underskull!
description.french: Vaincre le boss du Skull Clan Gang, Marga Underskull !
description.german: Besiege den Totenschädel-Clan-Boss: Marga Unterschädel!
description.italian: Sconfiggi il Boss del Clan del Teschio, Marga Underskull!
description.japanese: スカル団のボス、マルガ・アンダースカルを倒す！
description.koreana: 스컬 클랜 갱 보스, Marga Underskull을 처치하세요!
description.latam: ¡Derrotar a la Jefa del Clan del Cráneo, Marga Underskull!
description.polish: Pokonaj szefa Klanu Czaszki (Marg Underskull)!
description.russian: Победите лидера клана Черепа Marga Underskull!
description.schinese: 打败骷髅会老大马加·安得骷!
description.tchinese: 打敗骷髏部落大魔王Marga Underskull!
description.turkish: Kafatası Klanı Çetesinin Elebaşı Marga Underskull'ı yen!

description.brazilian: Derrote o Crustáceo da Ilha Cristada, o Karanguejo inimigo gigante!
description.english: Defeat the Island Crested Crustacean, Giant Enemy Kreb!
description.french: Vaincre le crustacé à crête de l’île, Giant Enemy Kreb !
description.german: Besiege das Insel-stemmende Schalentier: Riesiger Krabbi-Boss!
description.italian: Sconfiggi il Crostaceo Crestato dell'Isola, Giant Enemy Kreb!
description.japanese: 島のトサカの甲殻類、ジャイアント・エネミー・クラブを倒す！
description.koreana: 섬 갈기 갑각류, Giant Enemy Kreb을 처치하세요!
description.latam: ¡Derrotar al Crustáceo Isleño Supremo, Giant Enemy Kreb!
description.polish: Pokonaj Wyspowego Herbowego Skorupiaka (Giant Enemy Kreb)!
description.russian: Победите хохлатое ракообразное Giant Enemy Kreb!
description.schinese: 打败岛上的甲壳动物，巨敌蟹!
description.tchinese: 打敗島上有頂冠的甲殼動物Giant Enemy Kreb！
description.turkish: Ada Tepeli Kabuklusu Giant Enemy Kreb'i yen!

description.brazilian: Derrote o Tirano autocrata Tecno, Gelgar Roncafuça!
description.english: Defeat the Autogarch Tek Tyrant, Gelgar Rumbleshunt!
description.french: Vaincre l’Autogarch Tek Tyrant, Gelgar Rumbleshunt !
description.german: Besiege den fürchterlichen Tech-Tyrann: Gustav Rumpelstunt!
description.italian: Sconfiggi Autogarch Tek Tyrant, Gelgar Rumbleshunt!
description.japanese: オートガーク・テックの暴君 ゲルガー・ランブルシャントを倒せ！
description.koreana: 오토가치 테크 폭군, Gelgar Rumbleshunt를 처치하세요!
description.latam: ¡Derrotar al Autogarch Tek Tyrant, Gelgar Rumbleshunt!
description.polish: Pokonaj Gelgara Rumbleshunta (Autogarch Tek Tyrant)!
description.russian: Победите Autogarch Tek Tyrant, Gelgar Rumbleshunt!
description.schinese: 打败自控泰克暴君，格尔加·伦布莱斯亨特！
description.tchinese: 打敗Autogarch Tek Tyrant, Gelgar Rumbleshunt！
description.turkish: Autogarch Tek Tyrant Gelgar Rumbleshunt'u yen!

displayName.japanese: ポーラー・ポンティフィケーション

description.brazilian: Derrote o Valentão do Oceano gelado, Cascofrio Sopaposo!
description.english: Defeat the Ocean Ice Gargant, Coldcrust Glimmerfist!
description.french: Vaincre le gargant de glace de l’océan, Coldcrust Glimmerfist !
description.german: Besiege den Giganten des vereisten Ozeans: Eisige Schimmerfaust!

description.japanese: オーシャン・アイス・ガーガント、コールドクラスト・グリマーフィストを倒せ！
description.koreana: 바다 얼음 거인, Coldcrust Glimmerfist를 처치하세요!

description.russian: Победите ледяного океанического исполина Coldcrust Glimmerfist!
description.schinese: 打败海洋冰原巨兽，科德拉斯特·魏光拳!
description.tchinese: 打敗海洋冰巨人Coldcrust Glimmerfist！
description.turkish: Okyanus Buz Gargantı Coldcrust Glimmerfist'i yen!

description.brazilian: Derrote a Grande Moreia das cracas, o Leviatã de Magma!

description.italian: Sconfiggi la Murena Gargantuesca, Volcanic Leviathan!
description.japanese: 巨大化したフジツボウツボ、ボルカニック・リヴァイアサンを倒せ！
description.koreana: 거대 따개비 곰치, Volcanic Leviathan을 처치하세요!
description.latam: ¡Derrotar a la Morena Përcebe Crecida, Volcanic Leviathan!
description.polish: Pokonaj Powiększoną Barnacle Moray (Volcanic Leviathan)!
description.russian: Победите огромную приставучую мурену Volcanic Leviathan!
description.schinese: 打败超大海鳗，火山利维坦!
description.tchinese: 打敗Embiggened Barnacle Moray, Volcanic Leviathan！
description.turkish: İrileşen Kaya Midyesi Müreni Volcanic Leviathan'ı yen!

description.brazilian: Derrote O Arauto oscilante de Pedramorta, O Pires Voador cósmico!
description.english: Defeat the Oscillating Deadrock Doombringer, Cosmic Saucership
description.french: Vaincre l’oscillant et funeste Deadrock, Cosmic Saucership !

description.italian: Sconfiggi il Portatore di Distruzione Oscillante, Cosmic Saucership!
description.japanese: 振動するデッドロック・ドゥームブリンガー、コズミック・ソーサーシップを倒せ！
description.koreana: 진동 데드락 둠브링거, Cosmic Saucership을 처치하세요!
description.latam: ¡Derrotar al Portador de Fatalodad Deadrock, Cosmic Saucership!
description.polish: Pokonaj Oscylującego Siewcę Zguby Deadrock (Cosmic Saucership)!
description.russian: Победите вибрирующий Deadrock Doombringer, Cosmic Saucership!
description.schinese: 打败震荡死亡之石末日使者，宇宙索斯西!
description.tchinese: 打敗Oscillating Deadrock Doombringer, Cosmic Saucership！
description.turkish: Sallanan Deadrock Kıyamet Habercisi Cosmic Saucership'i yen!

description.brazilian: Ajude Frankerson Bello a recuperar a Lanterna Aurora.
description.english: Help Wayward Bello recover the Aurora Lantern

description.german: Hilf Wegweiser Bello, die Polar-Laterne wiederzuerlangen.
description.italian: Aiuta Wayward Bello a recuperare la Aurora Lantern.
description.japanese: ウェイワード・ベロのオーロラ・ランタン回収を手伝う

description.polish: Pomóż oddziałom żabiego wywiadu zbudować Froghammer.
description.russian: Помогите Корпусу квакеров построить Frogghammer.

description.tchinese: 協助C.C.C.打造蛙式打夯機。

description.brazilian: Ajude os Bãodipesca a pescar um Rancheiro.
description.english: Help the Anglerwranglers catch a Wranglerfish.

description.polish: Pomóż Anglerwranglersom złapać Wranglerfish.
description.russian: Помогите Anglerwranglers поймать Wranglerfish.

description.tchinese: 協助垂釣人抓到Wrangler魚。
description.turkish: Anglerwranglers'ın bir Wranglerfish yakalamasına yardım et.

description.brazilian: Ajude os Marémagiacos a libertar Sua Majestade Nausicaa da Esfera Mágika.

description.brazilian: Receba todas a Medalhas Coaxadoras do Almirante Picles.
description.english: Receive all of the Croaker Medals from Admiral Picklepea

description.italian: Ricevi tutte le Medaglie Gracidanti dall'Ammiraglio Picklepea.
description.japanese: ピックルピア提督からクローカーメダルを全てもらう。

description.italian: Chiacchiera con l'Agente Croquet nelle Autumn Isles.
description.japanese: 秋の島々でクロケット諜報員と話す。
description.koreana: 가을 섬에서 에이전트 Croquet과 대화하세요.

description.polish: Pomów z agentem Croquetem na Wyspach Jesiennych.
description.russian: Поговорите с агентом Croquet на Autumn Isles.

description.tchinese: 在秋天島嶼中與Croquet探員聊天。
description.turkish: Autumn Isles'ta Ajan Croquet ile sohbet et.

displayName.japanese: フィッシュ＆ティップス

description.brazilian: Consiga uma boa Dica de pesca com o velho Kelson Miódipesca.
description.english: Get a helpful Fish Tip from ol' Anglerwranglest Kerblapp
description.french: Recevoir un indice poissonneux utile de la part du vieil Anglerwranglest Kerblapp.
description.german: Hol dir vom alten Goldhaken Kebapp ein paar Tipps fürs Angeln.
description.italian: Ottieni un Consiglio di Pesca dal vecchio Anglerwranglest Kerblapp.
description.japanese: アングラーワラングレストのケーブラップから魚のヒントをもらう。
description.koreana: ol' Anglerwranglest Kerblapp에서 도움이 되는 피쉬 팁을 획득하세요.
description.latam: Obtener un útil consejo de pesca del viejo Anglerwranglest Kerblapp.
description.polish: Wyciągnij od starego Anglerwranglesta Kerblappa przydatne wskazówki na temat ryb.
description.russian: Получите от Anglerwranglest Kerblapp ценный совет по рыбалке.
description.schinese: 从钓鱼专家科巴拉那里得到一个有用的钓鱼技巧。
description.tchinese: 從Anglerwranglest Kerblapp中得到有用的抓魚要訣。
description.turkish: İhtiyar Anglerwranglest Kerblapp'tan faydalı bir Balık İpucu al.

displayName.japanese: ブローフィッシュ・ミー・ダウン

description.brazilian: Vença um jogo de Baiacu com o Kelson e o Otto.
description.english: Win a game of Blowfish with Kerblapp and Othoo.
description.french: Gagner une partie de Blowfish avec Kerblapp et Othoo.
description.german: Gewinne eine Partie Kugelfisch gegen Kebapp und Otto.
description.italian: Vinci una partita di Pescepalla con Kerblapp e Othoo.
description.japanese: ケーブラップとオトゥーとフグ釣りゲームに勝利する。
description.koreana: Kerblapp, Othoo과 블로피쉬 게임에서 이기세요.
description.latam: Ganar un juego de Pez Globo con Kerblapp y Othoo.
description.polish: Wygraj partię w Rozdymkę z Kerblappem i Othoo'em.
description.russian: Победите в игре Blowfish с Kerblapp и Othoo.
description.schinese: 赢得与科巴拉和奥托的河豚游戏。
description.tchinese: 與Kerblapp和Othoo嬴得與河豚的比賽。
description.turkish: Kerblapp ve Othoo ile bir Balon Balığı oyunu kazan.

description.brazilian: Derrube uma Espira de gelo sobre uma embarcação inimiga.
description.english: Knock over an Ice Spire onto an enemy vessel.
description.french: Renverser un pilier de glace sur un navire ennemi.
description.german: Lasse einen Eis-Turm auf ein gegnerisches Schiff fallen.
description.italian: Fai cadere una cuspide di ghiaccio su un vascello nemico.
description.japanese: 氷の尖塔を敵艦にぶつける。
description.koreana: 적 선박 위에서 아이스 스피어를 처치하세요.
description.latam: Derribar una Aguja de Hielo sobre una embarcación enemiga.
description.polish: Obal Lodową Iglicę na statek wroga.
description.russian: Обрушьте на вражеское судно ледяной пик.
description.schinese: 将一个冰锥打翻在敌人的船上。
description.tchinese: 敲擊敵船上的冰柱。
description.turkish: Bir Buz Kulesini bir düşman gemisinin üzerine devir.

description.brazilian: Faça um pinguim saltar na água para nadar.
description.english: Startle a pengy into jumping into the water for a swim.
description.french: Faire sursauter un pingouin pour qu’il tombe dans l’eau et prenne un bain.
description.german: Erschrecke einen Pinguin, damit er ins Wasser springt.
description.italian: Spaventa un pinguino e fallo saltare in acqua.
description.japanese: ペンギーを驚かせて水中に飛び込ませ、泳がせる。
description.koreana: 펭귄을 깜짝 놀래켜 물 속에 뛰어들어 수영하게 만드세요.
description.latam: Asustar a un pingüino para que salte al agua a nadar.
description.polish: Spłosz pingwina, aby wskoczył do wody na krótką kąpiel.
description.russian: Испугайте пингвина, чтобы он прыгнул в воду и поплыл.
description.schinese: 将一只企鹅吓得跳入水中游泳。
description.tchinese: 驚動企鵝跳入水中游泳。
description.turkish: Bir penguşu ürküterek suya zıplat ve yüzdür.

displayName.japanese: オーバー・ザ・ムーン

description.brazilian: Receba todas as Flores da lua reais de Sua Majestade Nausicaa.

description.french: Recevoir toutes les Moonflowers royales de Majesty Nausicaa.

description.french: Harponner une bernacle corrompue sur une créature marine.
description.german: Nutze deine Harpoone, um eine verdorbene Seepocke von einem Meeresbewohner zu angeln.
description.italian: Arpiona un Cirripide Contaminato da una Creatura Marina.
description.japanese: シークリーチャーからモリで汚染されたフジツボを取る。
description.koreana: 바다 괴물에 붙은 따개비를 떼어내세요.

description.polish: Traf harpunem skażoną pąklę morskiej kreatury.
description.russian: Поймайте на гарпун Tainted Barnacle c морского существа.

description.english: The Magik Shell Shop is open for business.

description.russian: Magik Shell Shop открыт.

description.brazilian: Visite o Capitão Tuto e o Ganso no Pós-jogo.
description.english: Visit Captain Toot and Goose in the Postgame
description.french: Passer voir le capitaine Toot et Goose en end-game.
description.german: Besuche Captain Tuut und Gulliver, nachdem du das Spiel abgeschlossen hast.
description.italian: Visita il Capitano Toot e Goose dopo la fine del gioco.
description.japanese: ポストゲームでトゥート船長とグースを訪ねる。
description.koreana: Postgame에서 캡틴 Toot와 Goose를 방문하세요.
description.latam: Visitar al Capitán Toot y Goose en el después del juego.
description.polish: Odwiedź kapitana Toota i Goose po ukończeniu gry.
description.russian: Посетите капитана Toot и Goose после окончания игры.
description.schinese: 在游戏结束后拜访托特船长和古斯。
description.tchinese: 在Postgame中造訪Toot隊長和鵝。
description.turkish: Oyun Sonrasında Kaptan Toot ve Goose'u ziyaret et.

description.brazilian: Termine o jogo e navegue em direção ao pôr do sol.
description.english: Finish the game and sail off into the sunset.
description.french: Terminer le jeu et voguer jusqu’au coucher du soleil.
description.german: Erreiche das Ende des Spiels und segle gen Sonnenuntergang.
description.italian: Finisci il gioco e naviga verso il tramonto.
description.japanese: ゲームを終了して、夕日に向け出航。
description.koreana: 게임을 완료하고 일출을 향해 항해하세요.
description.latam: Terminar el juego y navega hacia la puesta de sol.
description.polish: Ukończ grę i odpłyń w kierunku zachodzącego słońca.
description.russian: Завершите игру и уплывите на закат.
description.schinese: 完成游戏，驶向夕阳。
description.tchinese: 完成比賽，然後航向曰落處。
description.turkish: Oyunu bitir ve gün batımına doğru yelken aç.

displayName.japanese: 赤ちゃんのはじめてのあれ
displayName.tchinese: 嬰兒的第一個隨機事物

description.brazilian: Leve uma estranha relíquia Tralha antiga para um Faroleiro.
description.english: Conveyed a strange Ancient Junk relic to a Lightkeeper.
description.french: Apporter une étrange relique ancienne à un gardien de phare
description.german: Übergebe einem Lichtwächter antiken Plunder.
description.italian: Porta una strana Antica Spazzatura a un Lightkeeper.
description.japanese: 塔の守人に古代のガラクタの奇妙な遺物を届ける。
description.koreana: 비밀스러운 고대 고철 유물을 등대지기에게 전달하세요.
description.latam: Transportar una extraña reliquia de Basura Antigua a un Farero.
description.polish: Przekaż Starożytny Złom Strażnikowi Światła.
description.russian: Передайте смотрителю маяка странный древний обломок реликвии.
description.schinese: 将一个奇怪的古代废弃遗物交给守灯人。
description.tchinese: 傳送奇怪的古老垃圾遺跡給燈塔守望人。
description.turkish: Garip bir Kadim Hurda yadigârını bir Deniz Feneri Bekçisine götür.

displayName.japanese: だれかとなにかがたくさん

description.brazilian: Entregue todos os pedaços de Tralha antiga para os Faroleiros.
description.english: Deliver every piece of Ancient Junk to the Lightkeepers.
description.french: Apporter toutes les reliques anciennes aux gardiens de phare.
description.german: Liefere den Lichtwächtern alle Stücke von antikem Plunder.
description.italian: Consegna ogni pezzo di Antica Spazzatura ai Lightkeepers.
description.japanese: 古代のガラクタの破片をすべて塔の守人に届ける。
description.koreana: 고대 고철의 모든 조각을 등대지기에게 전해주세요.
description.latam: Entregar todas las piezas de Basura Antigua a los Fareros.
description.polish: Dostarcz cały Starożytny Złom Strażnikom Światła.
description.russian: Доставьте смотрителям маяка все древние обломки.
description.schinese: 将每件古代遗物交付给守灯人。
description.tchinese: 交付每一塊古老的垃圾給燈塔守望人。
description.turkish: Kadim Hurdanın her parçasını Deniz Feneri Bekçilerine teslim et.

displayName.japanese: 仕掛け万全 あとはお手上げ

description.brazilian: Pegue todos os peixes e complete sua coleção.
description.english: Catch every fish and complete your collection.
description.french: Attraper tous les poissons pour achever votre collection.
description.german: Fange jeden einzelnen Fisch und vervollständige deine Sammlung.
description.italian: Cattura ogni pesce e completa la tua collezione.
description.japanese: すべての魚を釣ってコレクションを完成させる。
description.koreana: 물고기를 모두 잡아 컬렉션을 완성하세요.
description.latam: Capturar todos los peces y completa tu colección.
description.polish: Złap każdą rybę, aby mieć całą kolekcję.
description.russian: Поймайте все виды рыбы и соберите коллекцию.
description.schinese: 捕获每一条鱼，完成你的完整收藏。
description.tchinese: 抓住每一條魚並完成您的收集。
description.turkish: Her balığı yakala ve koleksiyonunu tamamla.

description.brazilian: Fotografe tudo para o Clinks e complete sua coleção.
description.english: Photograph everything for Snapps and complete your collection.
description.french: Tout photographier pour Snapps pour achever votre collection.
description.german: Fotografiere alles für Schnapp und vervollständige deine Sammlung
description.italian: Fotografa tutto per Snapps e completa la tua collezione.
description.japanese: すべての魚を写真に撮ってコレクションを完成させる。
description.koreana: Snapps에 대한 사진을 모두 찍어 컬렉션을 완성하세요.
description.latam: Fotografiar todo para Snapps y complete su colección.
description.polish: Zrób wszystkie zdjęcia, których potrzebuje Snapps, aby mieć całą kolekcję.
description.russian: Сфотографируйте всё для Snapps и соберите коллекцию.
description.schinese: 为斯耐普拍摄一切，完成你的收藏。
description.tchinese: 將Snapps的一切拍照並完成您的收集。
description.turkish: Snapps için her şeyin fotoğrafını çek ve koleksiyonunu tamamla.

description.brazilian: Preencha metade da sua Coleção de peixes. Continue assim!
description.english: Fill out half of your Fish Collection. Keep it up!
description.french: Obtenir la moitié de la collection de poissons. On est sur la bonne voie !
description.german: Fülle die Hälfte deiner Fisch-Sammlung. Weiter so!
description.italian: Riempi a metà la tua Collezione di Pesci. Continua così!
description.japanese: 魚コレクションの半分をコンプリート。その調子だ！
description.koreana: 물고기 컬렉션을 절반 완성하세요. 계속 힘내세요!
description.latam: Completar la mitad de tu Colección de Peces. ¡Sigue así!
description.polish: Zgromadź połowę kolekcji ryb. Powodzenia!
description.russian: Соберите половину коллекции рыбы. Продолжайте в том же духе!
description.schinese: 完成你一半的鱼类收藏。继续保持!
description.tchinese: 完成您的魚類收集的一半。跟上進度！
description.turkish: Balık Koleksiyonunun yarısını doldur. Aynen devam et!

description.brazilian: Preencheu metade da sua Coleção de fotos. Belo trabalho!
description.english: Fill your Photo Collection halfway. Nice work!
description.french: Obtenir la moitié de la collection photo. Beau travail !
description.german: Fülle die Hälfte deiner Foto-Sammlung. Sehr gut!
description.italian: Riempi a metà la tua Collezione di Foto. Ottimo lavoro!
description.japanese: 写真コレクションを半分まで埋める。いいぞ！
description.koreana: 사진 컬렉션을 절반 완성하세요. 잘 하고 있습니다!
description.latam: Llenar tu Colección de Fotos hasta la mitad. ¡Buen trabajo!
description.polish: Zgomadź połowę kolekcji zdjęć. Powodzenia!
description.russian: Соберите половину коллекции снимков. Отличная работа!
description.schinese: 把你的照片集装满一半。干得好!
description.tchinese: 完成您的照片收集的一半。幹得好！
description.turkish: Fotoğraf Koleksiyonun yarıya ulaştı. Bravo!

description.brazilian: Gaste uma quantia modesta de peças de barco na Casa do Barco.
description.english: Spend a modest amount of Boat Parts at Shipshape Shops
description.french: Dépenser une modeste quantité de composants nautiques aux boutiques Shipshape.
description.german: Gib eine geringe Menge an Schiffteilen im Verschiffer-Shop aus.
description.italian: Spendi una modesta quantità di denaro in Parti di Nave ai Negozi Shipshape.
description.japanese: 船形ショップで船のパーツをそこそこ使う。
description.koreana: Shipshape 상점에서 보트 부품을 일정량 소모하세요.
description.latam: Gastar una cantidad modesta en Piezas del Barco en las Tiendas Shipshape.
description.polish: Wykorzystaj umiarkowaną ilość części łodzi w sklepach Shipshape.
description.russian: Потратьте скромное количество деталей корабля в магазинах Shipshape.
description.schinese: 在船形店中花费适量的船部件。
description.tchinese: 在船形商店花費適量的船零件。
description.turkish: Shipshape Dükkânlarında mütevazı miktarda Tekne Parçası harca.

displayName.german: Ich bin kein Fan von Schnecken

description.brazilian: Gaste uma quantia anormal de peças de barco na Casa do Barco.
description.english: Spend an abnormal amount of Boat Parts at the Shipshape Shops
description.french: Dépenser une énorme quantité de composants nautiques aux boutiques Shipshape.
description.german: Gib eine große Menge an Schiffteilen im Verschiffer-Shop aus.
description.italian: Spendi una quantità anormale di denaro in Parti di Nave ai Negozi Shipshape.
description.japanese: 船形ショップで船のパーツを異常に使う。
description.koreana: Shipshape 상점에서 보트 부품을 비정상적으로 소모하세요.
description.latam: Gastar una cantidad anormal en Piezas del Barco en las Tiendas Shipshape.
description.polish: Wykorzystaj ogromną ilość części łodzi w sklepach Shipshape.
description.russian: Потратьте нескромное количество деталей корабля в магазинах Shipshape.
description.schinese: 在船形店花掉不正常数量的船部件。
description.tchinese: 在船形商店花費異常量的船零件。
description.turkish: Shipshape Dükkânlarında anormal miktarda Tekne Parçası harca.

displayName.brazilian: Mas as lesmas gostam de mim
displayName.japanese: でもナメクジには好かれる
displayName.latam: Pero a las Babosas les Caigo Bien

description.brazilian: Gaste uma quantia absurda de peças de barco na Casa do Barco.
description.english: Spend a preposterous amount of Boat Parts at the Shipshape Shops.
description.french: Dépenser une ridicule quantité de composants nautiques aux boutiques Shipshape.
description.german: Gib eine absurde Menge an Schiffteilen im Verschiffer-Shop aus.
description.italian: Spendi una ragguardevole quantità di denaro in Parti di Nave ai Negozi Shipshape.
description.japanese: 船形ショップで船のパーツをとんでもない額使う。
description.koreana: Shipshape 상점에서 보트 부품을 터무니없을 만큼 소모하세요.
description.latam: Gastar una cantidad descomunal en Piezas del Barco en las Tiendas Shipshape.
description.polish: Wykorzystaj astronomiczną ilość części łodzi w sklepach Shipshape.
description.russian: Потратьте возмутительное количество деталей корабля в магазинах Shipshape.
description.schinese: 在船形店花了令人咂舌的船部件。
description.tchinese: 在船形商店花費荒謬數量的船零件。
description.turkish: Shipshape Dükkânlarında akıl almaz miktarda Tekne Parçası harca.

description.brazilian: O que é esse cheiro? Tem algo queimando?
description.english: What's that smell? Is something burning?
description.french: C’est quoi, cette odeur ? Y a un truc qui brûle ?
description.german: ...Riecht hier etwas verbrannt?
description.italian: Cos'è questo odore? Sta bruciando qualcosa?
description.japanese: この臭いは何？何か燃えてる？
description.koreana: 이게 무슨 냄새지? 뭐가 타고 있나?
description.latam: ¿Qué es ese olor? ¿Algo se está quemando?
description.polish: Co tak śmierdzi? Pali się?
description.russian: Что это за запах? Что-то горит?
description.schinese: 那是什么味道？有东西烧着了吗？
description.tchinese: 那是什麼味道？有什麼東西在燒嗎？
description.turkish: Bu koku da ne? Bir şeyler mi yanıyor?

description.brazilian: Ateie fogo em uma embarcação inimiga.
description.english: Light an enemy vessel on fire.
description.french: Incendier un vaisseau ennemi.
description.german: Lass ein gegnerisches Schiff in Flammen aufgehen.
description.italian: Dai fuoco a un vascello nemico.
description.japanese: 敵艦に火をつける。
description.koreana: 적 선박에 불을 붙이세요.
description.latam: Hacer arder una nave enemiga.
description.polish: Podpal statki wroga.
description.russian: Подожгите вражеский корабль.
description.schinese: 点燃一艘敌方船只。
description.tchinese: 照亮起火的敵船。
description.turkish: Bir düşman gemisini ateşe ver.

description.brazilian: Ganhe uma corrida contra Zacarias e Dexter.
description.english: Win a race against Zimothy and Dexter.
description.french: Gagner une course contre Zimothy et Dexter.
description.german: Gewinne ein Rennen gegen Tim und David.
description.italian: Vinci una gara contro Zimothy e Dexter.
description.japanese: ジモシーとデクスターのレースに勝利する。
description.koreana: Zimothy와 Dexter의 경주에서 이기세요.
description.latam: Ganar una carrera contra Zimothy y Dexter.
description.polish: Wygraj wyścig z Zimothym i Dexterem.
description.russian: Победите в гонке против Zimothy и Dexter.
description.schinese: 在与齐莫西和德克斯特的比赛中获胜。
description.tchinese: 嬴得與Zimothy和Dexter的競速。
description.turkish: Zimothy ve Dexter'a karşı bir yarış kazan.

displayName.japanese: 全てはスピードのため

description.brazilian: Derrote o Seis Braças pelo menos uma vez em cada Mundo.
description.english: Defeat the Deep Six at least once in every World.
description.french: Vaincre les Deep Six au moins une fois dans chaque monde.
description.german: Besiege die Plankenspringer mindestens einmal in jeder Welt.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Deep Six almeno una volta in ogni Mondo.
description.japanese: 全ワールドでディープ・シックスを1回以上倒す。
description.koreana: 모든 월드에서 Deep Six를 적어도 한 번 이상 처치하세요.
description.latam: Derrotar a los Deep Six al menos una vez en cada mundo.
description.polish: Pokonaj Deep Six przynajmniej raz w każdym świecie.
description.russian: Хотя бы раз победите в Deep Six в каждом мире.
description.schinese: 在每个世界中至少打败海葬号一次。
description.tchinese: 在每個世界打敗Deep Six至少一次。
description.turkish: Deep Six'i her Dünyada en az bir kez yen.

displayName.japanese: 良い射撃だ ダッド

description.brazilian: Complete uma das pistas de tiro de Wesley Pistolão.
description.english: Complete one of Wesley Dudshooter's target courses.
description.french: Terminer un des parcours de tir de Wesley Dudshooter.
description.german: Schließe eine Schießstrecke von Wilhelm Adlerauge ab.
description.italian: Completa un percorso a ostacoli di Wesley Dudshooter.
description.japanese: ウェスリー・ダッドシューターのターゲットコースを1つクリアーする。
description.koreana: Wesley Dudshooter의 목표 코스 중 하나를 완료하세요.
description.latam: Completar uno de los cursos objetivo de Wesley Dudshooter.
description.polish: Ukończ kurs celności Wesley'a Dudshootera.
description.russian: Пройдите один курс по стрельбе от Wesley Dudshooter.
description.schinese: 完成韦斯利·杜斯霍特的一个目标课程。
description.tchinese: 完成Wesley Dudshooter的其中一個目標課程。
description.turkish: Wesley Dudshooter'ın hedef rotalarından birini tamamla.

description.brazilian: Complete todas as pistas de tiro de Wesley Pistolão.
description.english: Complete all of Wesley Dudshooter's target courses.
description.french: Terminer tous les parcours de tir de Wesley Dudshooter.
description.german: Schließe alle Schießstrecken von Wilhelm Adlerauge ab.
description.italian: Completa tutti i percorsi a ostacoli di Wesley Dudshooter.
description.japanese: ウェスリー・ダッドシューターのターゲットコースをすべてクリアする。
description.koreana: Wesley Dudshooter의 목표 코스를 모두 완료하세요.
description.latam: Completar todos los cursos objetivo de Wesley Dudshooter.
description.polish: Ukończ wszystkie kursy celności Wesley'a Dudshootera.
description.russian: Пройдите все курсы по стрельбе от Wesley Dudshooter.
description.schinese: 完成韦斯利·杜斯霍特的所有目标课程。
description.tchinese: 完成Wesley Dudshooter的所有目標課程。
description.turkish: Wesley Dudshooter'ın hedef rotalarının hepsini tamamla.

description.brazilian: Complete seu primeiro evento de Prisma de luz com os Faroleiros.
description.english: Complete your first Light Prism event with the Lightkeepers.
description.french: Terminer votre premier événement Light Prism avec les gardiens de phare.
description.german: Schließe dein erstes Leucht-Prisma-Ereignis mit den Lichtwächtern ab.
description.italian: Completa il tuo primo evento Light Prism con i Lightkeepers.
description.japanese: 塔の守人と一緒にライトプリズムのイベントを初めてクリアする。
description.koreana: 등대지기와 첫 번째 라이트 프리즘 이벤트를 완료하세요.
description.latam: Completar tu primer evento Prisma de Luz con los Fareros.
description.polish: Ukończ pierwsze wydarzenie Pryzmat Światła ze Strażnikami Światła.
description.russian: Пройдите со смотрителями маяка первое событие Light Prism.
description.schinese: 与守灯人一起完成你的第一个光之棱镜活动。
description.tchinese: 和燈塔守望人完成您的第一個「三稜鏡光線」活動。
description.turkish: Deniz Feneri Bekçileriyle ilk Işık Prizması etkinliğini tamamla.

description.brazilian: Complete todos os eventos de Prisma dos Faroleiros.
description.english: Complete all of the Lighthouse Prism events.
description.french: Terminer tous les événements Lighthouse Prism.
description.german: Schließe alle Leuchtturm-Prisma-Ereignisse ab.
description.italian: Completa tutti gli evento della Lighthouse Prism.
description.japanese: ライトプリズムイベントをすべてクリアする。
description.koreana: 등대 프리즘 이벤트를 모두 완료하세요.
description.latam: Completar todos los eventos Prisma de Luz.
description.polish: Ukończ wszystkie wydarzenia Pryzmat Latarni.
description.russian: Пройдите все события Lighthouse Prism.
description.schinese: 完成所有的灯塔棱镜活动。
description.tchinese: 完成所有的「燈塔三稜鏡」活動。
description.turkish: Tüm Deniz Feneri Prizması etkinliklerini tamamla.

displayName.german: Da wollte mir jemand an den Kraken

description.brazilian: Derrote o Guardião tentaculoso do Reino dos prismas, o Kraken da Noite eterna!
description.english: Defeat the Betentacled Prism Realm Guardian, Eternal Night Kraken!
description.french: Vaincre le gardien tentaculaire du royaume des prismes, l’Eternal Night Kraken !
description.german: Besiege den Wächter des Prisma-Reichs: Kraken der ewigen Nacht!
description.italian: Sconfiggi il Guardiano Tentacolare del Reame Prismatico, Eternal Night Kraken!
description.japanese: 触手をもがれたプリズム領地の守護者、エターナルナイト・クラーケンを倒す！
description.koreana: 촉수 프리즘 렐름 가디언, Eternal Night Kraken을 처치하세요!
description.latam: ¡Derrotar al Guardián del Reino del Prisma con Tentáculos, Eternal Night Kraken!
description.polish: Pokonaj Krakena Wiecznej Nocy, Mackowatego Strażnika Świata Pryzmatu.
description.russian: Победите Betentacled Prism Realm Guardian, Eternal Night Kraken!
description.schinese: 打败贝登泰克棱镜境界守护者，永夜克拉肯!
description.tchinese: 打敗Betentacled Prism Realm護衛Eternal Night Kraken！
description.turkish: Duyargalı Prizma Diyarı Muhafızı Eternal Night Kraken'i yen!

description.brazilian: Rastreie um comerciante ilegal para os Coaxadores.
description.english: Track down an illegal trader for the Croakers.
description.french: Trouver la trace d’un marchand clandestin pour les Croakers.
description.german: Hilf den Kwakern, einen illegalen Händler zu finden.
description.italian: Scopri un contrabbandieri per il Reparto di Sicrarezza.
description.japanese: クローカー人の違法取引相手を追跡する。
description.koreana: Croaker를 위해 밀수업자를 찾아내세요.
description.latam: Seguir a un comerciante ilegal para los Croadores.
description.polish: Wytrop handlarza nielegalnym towarem na zlecenie żaboli.
description.russian: Выследите контрабандиста для квакеров.
description.schinese: 为呱呱蛙司令部追踪一个非法交易商。
description.tchinese: 追蹤呱呱蛙的非法交易者。
description.turkish: Kurbağalar için yasa dışı bir tüccarı bul.

displayName.italian: Il più ricercato dal Reparto di Sicrarezza
displayName.japanese: クローカー司令軍最重要指名手配
displayName.latam: Más Buscados por el Comando Croador
displayName.schinese: 呱呱蛙司令部的头号通缉犯
displayName.tchinese: 呱呱蛙指揮的最優先懸賞

description.brazilian: Feche completamente o centro de comércio ilegal para os Coaxadores.
description.english: Completely shut down the illegal trade ring for the Croakers.
description.french: Démanteler complètement le réseau clandestin pour les Croakers.
description.german: Hilf den Kwakern, den illegalen Schmugglerring zu zerschlagen.
description.italian: Distruggi il commercio illegale per il Reparto di Sicrarezza.
description.japanese: クロッカー人の違法取引組織を壊滅させる。
description.koreana: Croaker를 위해 밀수 경로를 완전히 끊어내세요.
description.latam: Cerrar completamente el ciclo de comercio ilegal de los Croadores.
description.polish: Całkowicie rozbij szajkę handlarzy nielegalnym towarem na zlecenie żaboli.
description.russian: Помогите квакерам полностью покончить с шайкой контрабандистов.
description.schinese: 彻底关闭呱呱蛙的非法贸易团伙。
description.tchinese: 完全關閉呱呱蛙的非法交易圈。
description.turkish: Kurbağalar için yasa dışı ticaret çemberine son ver.

description.brazilian: Resolva a situação complicada entre Marley e Zeca.
description.english: Conclude the sticky situation between Marley and Scampy.
description.french: Arranger la situation épineuse entre Marley et Scampy.
description.german: Schlichte den Streit zwischen Mark und Scampi.
description.italian: Risolvi la situazione tra Marley e Scampy.
description.japanese: マーリーとスキャンピーの関係を解決する。
description.koreana: Marley와 Scampy 사이의 불편한 관계를 끝내세요.
description.latam: Dar fin a la incómoda situación entre Marley y Scampy.
description.polish: Rozwiąż scysję pomiędzy Marley'em i Scampym.
description.russian: Помогите уладить щекотливую ситуацию между Marley и Scampy.
description.schinese: 结束马利和史坎普之间的胶着状态。
description.tchinese: 結束Marley和Scampy之間的膠著情況。
description.turkish: Marley ile Scampy arasındaki sıkıntılı durumu bitir.

description.brazilian: Mantenha suas velas perfeitamente ajustadas por pelo menos 15 segundos.
description.english: Keep your sails perfectly adjusted for at least 15 seconds.
description.french: Maintenir les voiles parfaitement ajustées pendant au moins 15 secondes.
description.german: Richte deine Segel mindestens 15 Sekunden perfekt mit dem Wind aus.
description.italian: Mantieni le vele in posizione perfetta per almeno 15 secondi.
description.japanese: 帆を15秒以上完璧に調整する。
description.koreana: 적어도 15초 이상 완벽한 항해를 이어가세요.
description.latam: Mantener las velas perfectamente ajustadas durante al menos 15 segundos.
description.polish: Utrzymuj żagle w idealnej pozycji przez przynajmniej 15 sekund.
description.russian: Держите паруса в идеальном положении 15 секунд.
description.schinese: 保持你的船帆完美适航至少15秒。
description.tchinese: 保持您的航行完美調整至少15秒。
description.turkish: Yelkenlerini en az 15 saniye kusursuz şekilde ayarlanmış olarak tut.

description.brazilian: Aborde com sucesso uma embarcação inimiga.
description.english: Successfully board an enemy vessel.
description.french: Réussir l’abordage d’un navire ennemi.
description.german: Entere ein gegnerisches Schiff.
description.italian: Abborda un vascello nemico.
description.japanese: 敵艦への乗船に成功する。
description.koreana: 적 선박 위에 성공적으로 올라타세요.
description.latam: Abordar con éxito una nave enemiga.
description.polish: Wedrzyj się na pokład wroga.
description.russian: Высадитесь на вражеском судне.
description.schinese: 成功登上一艘敌方船只。
description.tchinese: 成功登上敵船！
description.turkish: Bir düşman gemisine başarıyla bin.

displayName.japanese: デイヴィ・ジョーンズ

description.brazilian: Afunde sua primeira embarcação inimiga.
description.english: Sink your first enemy vessel.
description.french: Faire couler un navire ennemi pour la première fois.
description.german: Versenke dein erstes gegnerisches Schiff.
description.italian: Affonda il tuo primo vascello nemico.
description.japanese: 最初の敵艦を撃沈する。
description.koreana: 첫 번째 적 선박을 침몰시키세요.
description.latam: Hundir tu primera nave enemiga.
description.polish: Zatop pierwszy statek wroga.
description.russian: Потопите первый вражеский корабль.
description.schinese: 击沉你的第一艘敌船。
description.tchinese: 擊沈您的第一艘敵船！
description.turkish: İlk düşman gemini batır.

description.brazilian: Capture um Navio-tanque do Clã Tecno.
description.english: Capture a Tekk Clan Tanker.
description.french: Capturer le bateau-citerne du Tekk Clan.
description.german: Kapere einen Tekk-Clan-Tanker.
description.italian: Cattura una petroliera del Tekk Clan.
description.japanese: テック・クランのタンカーを拿捕する。
description.koreana: Tekk Clan 탱커를 생포하세요.
description.latam: Capturar un barco cisterna del Tekk Clan
description.polish: Przechwyć tankowiec Klanu Tekk.
description.russian: Поймайте танкер Tekk Clan.
description.schinese: 捕获一艘泰克家族的油轮。
description.tchinese: 抓住Tekk Clan油輪。
description.turkish: Bir Tekk Klanı Tankçısını ele geçir.
